alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Taylor County through 930 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chelsea, or 10 miles north of Medford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rib Lake around 905 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Wood Lake, North Twin Lake, The Mondeaux Flowage, Highway 13 And County Road M, The Taylor County Airport, Stetsonville, County Roads A And E, Highway M And Joe Martin Road, Esadore Lake and Camp Forest Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
